name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Basics
lessons.description: Overview of rocket propulsion fundamentals.

lessons.name: Thrust and Propellant
lessons.description: Thrust generation and types of rocket propellants.

lessons.name: Rocket Thrust Calculation
lessons.description: Calculating thrust generated by rocket engines.

lessons.name: Rocket Propellant Types
lessons.description: In-depth analysis of various rocket propellant types.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Types of Rocket Fuels
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Efficiency
lessons.description: Measuring and optimizing combustion efficiency.

lessons.name: Emissions Control
lessons.description: Controlling emissions during rocket combustion.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Shapes and Performance
lessons.description: Effect of nozzle shapes on rocket performance.

lessons.name: Nozzle Materials
lessons.description: Material selection for rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Thrust Vector Control
lessons.description: Implementing thrust vector control systems in nozzle design.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Principles
lessons.description: Fundamentals of aerodynamics and airfoil design.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Lift and Drag
lessons.description: Exploring lift and drag forces in aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil Shapes
lessons.description: Designing airfoils for specific aerodynamic requirements.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Theory
lessons.description: Exploration of subsonic airflow phenomena.

lessons.name: Shock Waves
lessons.description: Understanding shock waves in supersonic flow.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Flight
lessons.description: Exploration of hypersonic flight and its challenges.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Materials
lessons.description: Materials used for spacecraft thermal protection.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Designing and implementing thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Reentry Heating
lessons.description: Handling reentry heating during space missions.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Components
lessons.description: Key components of spacecraft structural design.

lessons.name: Materials Selection
lessons.description: Selecting materials for spacecraft structural components.

lessons.name: Load Analysis
lessons.description: Analyzing and simulating structural loads in spacecraft design.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws
lessons.description: Laws governing planetary motion and orbits.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfer Maneuvers
lessons.description: Performing orbital transfer maneuvers and station-keeping.

lessons.name: Mission Planning
lessons.description: Planning space missions and trajectory optimization.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Systems Integration
lessons.description: Integration of subsystems in spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Subsystems Integration
lessons.description: Integrating various subsystems in spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Testing and Validation
lessons.description: Testing and validating spacecraft systems.
